message.name: INF_BPOCASESEARCH_NO_MATCH
message.locale: No case could be found which matched the search criteria.

message.name: INF_BPOCASESEARCH_NO_CASE_REFERENCE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: You must specify a case reference number.

message.name: ERR_BPOCASESEARCH_NO_CRITERIA_SPECIFIED
message.locale: At least one search criteria must be entered.

message.name: ERR_BPOCASESEARCH_ADDITIONAL_CRITERIA
message.locale: Please specify additional search criteria.

message.name: ERR_BPOCASESEARCH_NO_TYPE
message.locale: Please specify a type.

message.name: ERR_BPOCASESEARCH_NO_CATEGORY
message.locale: Please specify a category.

message.name: ERR_BPOCASESEARCH_MISSING_CRITERIA
message.locale: Please refine the search criteria. At least one more search criteria must be specified.

message.name: ERR_CASESEARCH_UNIMPLEMENTED
message.locale: No Case Search implemented. Please contact an Administrator.

message.name: ERR_CASESEARCH_MAXIMUM
message.locale: The maximum search result has been exceeded. Please refine your search.

message.name: ERR_BPOCASESEARCH_FV_START_DATE_FROM_LARGE
message.locale: The start 'From' date must not be in the future.

message.name: ERR_BPOCASESEARCH_FV_START_DATE_TO_LARGE
message.locale: The start 'To' date must not be in the future.

message.name: ERR_BPOCASESEARCH_XFV_START_DATE_FROM_START_DATE_TO
message.locale: The start 'To' date must not be before the start 'From' date.

message.name: ERR_BPOCASESEARCH_XFV_END_DATE_FROM_END_DATE_TO
message.locale: The end 'To' date must not be before the end 'From' date.

message.name: ERR_BPOCASESEARCH_XFV_START_DATE_FROM_END_DATE_FROM
message.locale: The end 'From' date must not be before the start 'From' date.

message.name: ERR_BPOCASESEARCH_XFV_START_DATE_TO_END_DATE_TO
message.locale: The end 'To' date must not be before the start 'To' date.

message.name: ERR_BPOCASESEARCH_XFV_STATUS_TYPE
message.locale: The status '%1c' is not valid for the selected case type(s).

message.name: ERR_BPOCASESEARCH_FV_OWNER_EMPTY
message.locale: Please specify a case owner.

message.name: INF_BPOCASESEARCH_CASE_NOT_SEARCHABLE
message.locale: The case reference number entered is a valid reference but not for searching on cases listed on this page.

message.name: ERR_BPOCASESEARCH_FV_INVESTIGATION_OWNER_EMPTY
message.locale: Please specify an investigation owner.

message.name: ERR_BPOCASESEARCH_INVESTIGATION_SEARCH_UNIMPLEMENTED
message.locale: No Investigation Search implemented. Please contact an Administrator.

message.name: INF_BPOCASESEARCH_INVESTIGATION_NO_MATCH
message.locale: No investigation could be found which matched the search criteria.

message.name: INF_BPOCASESEARCH_CASE_SEARCH_CRITERIA_TEXT_TYPE_OWNER_STATUS
message.locale: Cases for types(s) %1s owned by %2s with a status of %3s.

message.name: INF_BPOCASESEARCH_CASE_SEARCH_CRITERIA_TEXT_OWNER
message.locale: Cases owned by %1s.

message.name: INF_BPOCASESEARCH_CASE_SEARCH_CRITERIA_TEXT_OWNER_STATUS
message.locale: Cases owned by %1s with a status of %2s.

message.name: INF_BPOCASESEARCH_CASE_SEARCH_CRITERIA_TEXT_TYPE_OWNER
message.locale: Cases for types(s) %1s owned by %2s.

message.name: INF_BPOCASESEARCH_CASE_SEARCH_CRITERIA_TEXT_ALL_TYPES_OWNER_STATUS
message.locale: Cases for all types owned by %1s with a status of %2s.

message.name: INF_BPOCASESEARCH_CASE_SEARCH_CRITERIA_TEXT_ALL_TYPES_OWNER
message.locale: Cases for all types owned by %1s.

message.name: INF_BPOCASESEARCH_INVESTIGATION_SEARCH_CRITERIA_TEXT_TYPE_OWNER_STATUS
message.locale: Investigations for types(s) %1s owned by %2s with a status of %3s.

message.name: INF_BPOCASESEARCH_INVESTIGATION_SEARCH_CRITERIA_TEXT_OWNER
message.locale: Investigations owned by %1s.

message.name: INF_BPOCASESEARCH_INVESTIGATION_SEARCH_CRITERIA_TEXT_OWNER_STATUS
message.locale: Investigations owned by %1s with a status of %2s.

message.name: INF_BPOCASESEARCH_INVESTIGATION_SEARCH_CRITERIA_TEXT_TYPE_OWNER
message.locale: Investigations for types(s) %1s owned by %2s.

message.name: INF_BPOCASESEARCH_INVESTIGATION_SEARCH_CRITERIA_TEXT_ALL_TYPES_OWNER_STATUS
message.locale: Investigations for all types owned by %1s with a status of %2s.

message.name: INF_BPOCASESEARCH_INVESTIGATION_SEARCH_CRITERIA_TEXT_ALL_TYPES_OWNER
message.locale: Investigations for all types owned by %1s.
